text: A mechanical harvester can replace an entire manual workforce, harvesting dozens of acres per day. This method also helps to minimize the risk of damage to the cabbage. The machine's front unit handles all the work. As it moves across the field, rotating metal spindles wrap around the cotton fibres, pulling them from the plants.
